text: three and a half years ago while my
fiancee Sarah and I were making love I
had a heart attack
911 see I was 48 and Sarah was 26 at the
time so there was a 22 year difference
when I met Tim I had no idea how old he
was they never seemed like it should
even matter
we had been pretty blithe about the
whole age difference thing but this was
something that spoke directly to the
fact that were in completely different
circumstances in a lot of ways and
that's going to be true the rest of our
lives together
I come from parents who have a big age
difference and my mom wanted me to be
warned that in 20 years it's not going
to be the same I understand that that is
her reality but it's not mine yet and if
in 20 years he's still my best friend
that's what matters the empties were
working on the end I looked over and
Sarah was packing an over-the-shoulder
kind of overnight bag sweater and clean
clothes and his running shoes just
something for my stay in the hospital
and the fact that she was so sure that I
was coming back that really meant a lot
to me
it made me realized that even if my life
didn't have significance for me it had
significance for her yes this is my fear
that something like this could happen
again but that's everybody's fear I
think if they're in a committed
relationship and I don't think it really
matters what you're going to do without
the other person it matters what you're
going to do with that person while
you're together Sarah and I got married
six months after I had my heart attack
I had spent pretty much my whole idle
life doing what I wanted how I wanted
when I wanted and I smoked two packs a
day for about 30 years
in a lot of ways meeting Sara was the
beginning of my life
sometimes what love can do is save you
from yourself
